section.name: Introduction
section.p: Circuit Breaker is an implementation of the Circuit Breaker stability design pattern as described in the book Release It! by Michael Nygard.
For more information please read the project's FAQ.

section.name: Status
section.p: The project has no stable release yet but we have implemented all the features planned for the first release and there are no known bugs.

section.name: News
section.p: For the complete list of changes visit the project's commit history

ul.li: Added a 3rd implementation using AOP Alliance's MethodInterceptor.
Various JMX changes including a change in the ObjectName that is used to register the circuit breakers to JMX.
Added the ability to count slow method executions as failures.
We have implemented a Spring version of the circuit breaker and fixed some important bugs.
First public release, your feedback is welcome.
